Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AILDLSINFO

The structure AILDLSINFO specifies the details for a DLS device.

struct AILDLSINFO
{
  S32 MaxDLSMemory;
  S32 CurrentDLSMemory;
  S32 LargestSize;
  S32 GMAvailable;
  S32 GMBankSize;
};

In Members

MaxDLSMemory
Maximum amount of DLS memory available. Always 2 GB with the software synth.
CurrentDLSMemory
Current amount of memory dedicated to DLS use. Always 2 GB with the software synth.
LargestSize
Largest DLS file that could be loaded right now. Always 2 GB with the software synth.
GMAvailable
General MIDI availability status. Not applicable to the software synth.
GMBankSize
Size of the General MIDI set. Not applicable to the software synth.


Group: DLS Services
Related Functions: AIL_DLS_get_info
Related Basic Types: S32
